property.name: Text
property.value: You collect 1 additional resource during each upkeep phase. ε effect: +1 for each resource you have.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class. Deckbuilding requirements (do not count toward deck size): Jenny's Twin .45s, Searching for Izzie, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Jenny Barnes deck only. Replacement. θ Spend up to 3 resources and exhaust Green Man Medallion: Place those resources on it, as offerings. ι When you resign or the game ends: For every 6 offerings on Green Man Medallion, reduce the experience cost of the next card you purchase before the next scenario by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Jenny Barnes deck only. Replacement. Spawn - Location farthest from you. Jenny Barnes cannot gain resources via card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you defeat an enemy: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.) ε effect: +1 for each clue on your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Roland Banks deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Either place 1 clue (fron the token bank) on your location, or discover 1 clue at your location. Remove Mysteries Remain from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Roland Banks deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Place 2 of your clues on your location. If you cannot, place all of your clues on your location, take 1 horror, and shuffle The Dirge of Reason back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play with the top card of your deck revealed. Once per round, you may play the top card of your deck as if it were in your hand, at -1 resource cost. Forced - AFter a weakness is revealed while on top of your deck: Draw it. ε effect: +X. You may swap the top card of your deck with a card in your hand. X is the resource cost of the top card of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0, Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 1-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 5 Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Livre d'Eibon, The Harbinger, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Norman Withers deck only. Replacement. η: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck. θ Exhaust Split the Angle and discard the top card of your deck: Discard the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Norman Withers deck only. Replacement. Prey - Norman Withers only. While Vengeful Hounds is engaged with you, you cannot draw or reveal cards via player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After one of you card effects heals horror from an investigator or Ally asset: The healed card's controller gains 1 resource.ε effect: +1. You may heal 1 horror from an investigator or Ally asset at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck Size: 30.Deckbuilding Options: Guardian Cards level 0-3, Neutral Cards level 0-5, cards that "heal horror" level 0-5, up to 15 Seeker and/or Mystic cards level 0-1.Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Hypnotic Therapy, Rational Thought, 1 random basic weakness.Additional Restrictions: No Weapon cards level 1-5.

property.name: Text
property.value: Carolyn Fern deck only. Replacement.Foolishness enters play with 3 horror on him. Horror on him may be healed as if it were on Carolyn Fern. While Foolishness has no horror on him, you get +1 to all skills.

property.name: Text
property.value: Carolyn Fern deck only. Replacement.Revelation - Attach To Fight the Black Wind to the current agenda. Carolyn Fern takes 1 direct horror.Forced - At the end of the round, if any amount of horror was assigned to an investigator this round and it was not healed: Place 1 doom on attached agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you reveal a chaos token during a skill test you are performing: Return a skill you committed to this test to your hand. (Limit once per round.).ε effect: +0. You may commit a skill from your discard pile to this test. After this test ends, return that skill to your hand instead of discarding it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck Size: 30.Deckbuilding Options: Survivor Cards level 0-5, Neutral Cards Level 0-5, Innate skills level 0-2.Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Sea Charge Harpoon, Silas's Net, Siren Call, 1 random Basic Weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Silas Marsh deck only. Replacement.If a chaos token with a negative modifier is revealed during this test, either draw 1 card or Nautical Prowess gains ΰΰ

property.name: Text
property.value: Silas Marsh deck only. Replacement.This skill's icons subtract from your skill value instead of adding to it.If this skill test fails, return this skill to your hand.Forced - If Dreams of the Deep is in your hand at the end of your turn: Reveal it and take 2 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ During your turn, discard an asset you control: Play an asset with a different title from your hand, reducing its cost by 1. (Limit once per round.). ε effect: +2. You may return an asset from your play area to your hand. Then, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards (μ) level 0-5, Rogue cards (ν) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count towards deck size): Showmanship, Occult Scraps, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement. Exhaust Molly Maxwell and deal her 1 horror: Name any trait. One at a time, reveal cards from the top of your deck until an asset with the named trait is revealed. Draw that asset. Shuffle each other revealed card back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dexter Drake deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Put Yaztaroth into play in your threat area. You cannot put assets into play. ηη: Discard Yaztaroth.

property.name: Text
property.value: You choose the investigator order during the mythos phase. ι When you look at 1 or more cards from the encounter deck: Look at 1 additional card and choose 1 non-Elite card among them. Either discard it, put it on top of the encounter deck, or place it facedown beneath Gloria Goldberg (max 3 cards beneath her). ε effect: +1. Look at the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck Size: 30. Secondary Class Choise: At deck creation, choose Guardian (κ), Seeker (λ), or Rogue (ν). Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards (μ) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 10 level 0-1 events and/or skills of your chosen secondary class. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 copies of Psychic Sensitivity, 3 copies of Prophecy of the End (shuffled into the encounter deck), 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gloria Goldberg deck only. Replacement. ι When an investigator fights, attempts to evade, or initiates a skill test on an encounter card, discard an encounter card that shares a Trait with that encounter card from beneath Gloria Goldberg: Reduce the difficulty of this skill test by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gloria Goldberg deck only. Replacement. Revelation - Draw a random non-weakness encounter card from beneath Gloria Goldberg. That card gains peril, its effects cannot be canceled, and you get -2 to all skills while resolving its effects. If that card is an enemy, it immediately attacks you. If no card is drawn by this effect, shuffle this card back into your deck.
